div.div: The Hamshire-Fannett HS FIRST Tech Challenge team, Vector Robotics, earned the 1st place Inspire Award at the Central East League Championship and advanced to the Regional Championship.

p.strong: Required Notice of Adopted 2017 Tax Rate

hr.p: Hamshire-Fannett ISD HAS ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATION THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE.
Hamshire-Fannett ISD Copyright Infringement contact: Jon Burris, 12702 Second St., Hamshire, TX 77622, (409)243-2133, jburris@hfhorns.net

Si tiene dificultades para acceder a la información debido a una barrera del idioma, por favor comuníquese con la Sra. Daiana Wheeler por correo electrónico a dwheeler@hfhorns.net o por teléfono al (409) 222-6161, ext. 222.
